nodes.text: It looks like a pretty basic lock.
This is a Brown class, only used for training.
It's a newer style lock than the basic lock.
This is a Hardy class lock, one of the cheapest locks around.
This is one of the more common locks available.
It's the tricky L-Bow class.
This lock is complex - it requires a Houdini to open it.
Looks like a Marple class.
Looks like a frustrating Columbo class.
Another complex lock.
This is one of the trickiest locks out there.
It's a Marlowe.
It's a lock. That much I can tell.
This is exhausting. I've been staring at locks for much too long. I'm starting to cramp up. That's enough for today.
Is it getting close to suppertime? I'm starting to get hungry, too hungry to concentrate on lockpicking...
Yeah, I know, "Thieves do it in the middle of the night." But we Rogues need our beauty sleep, so forget it!
(Yawn) I'm getting really sleepy. It's too late to bother with this now.
Oh, man, this lock requires a Houdini to open it! They all do...
I've definitely got to get me one.
Hmmm... this lock is trickier than the other ones.
Huh, this is a different mechanism than the basic locks.
Man, this Houdini lockpicking is really complicated...
Bleh. This is even tougher than the last lock.
These locks keep getting more and more complex.
